frontmatter.title: Library Manager
frontmatter.description: Client database program designed to manage the issuance of books for a school library; developed in C#/XAML using WPF
frontmatter.lead: The application’s data model was built in C# while the UI leveraged XAML’s responsive binding create a fast and responsive user experience. Extensive product documentation was written in LaTeX and the application as a whole uilized a variety of open source APIs to facilitate development (i.e. PDF rendering & UI toolkits).
